about_the_game:
It's a Retro Styled Horror 3rd person Action Adventure Game with Modern Vibes and Roguelike Elements!
You have to escape a confinement with random generation elements, and stay alive and sane.
Imagine if Resident Evil, Silent Hill, SCP Containment Breach and Monstrum had a baby...

It is Cuming and you won't get away!

Take your chances against...

FEATURES

  • Take a Breath of a THIKK Horror Atmosphere
  • Meet the Lovely Ladies on your way
  • Escape your Fears, or Fight them!
  • Multiple endings
  • Lots of Fun Times!
  • Become Fit and Rich!

content_descriptors.notes:
There's a sexual themes, nudity and a violence in the game.
May not be appropriate to all ages.

name: CUMING FEAR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD A8-7410 with Radeon R5 Graphics 2200 Mhz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R5
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: X360 Controller Recommended

short_description: It's a Retro Styled Horror 3rd person Action Adventure Game with Modern Vibes and Roguelike Elements!
